title: DDFP: Jonah Keri Joins the Program -- Side B
itunes:title: DDFP: Jonah Keri Joins the Program -- Side B
description:
'The Extra 2%' author/Grantland.com writer/old pal, Jonah Keri, sits in with Shek & Rank for a conversation so rangy we had to cut it into two parts.  Among the subjects: is there any player whose injury could cause NFL ratings to dip?; the NCAA's conference shakeup; which NFL team that's considered a contender is least likely to be perceived that way by November; REM's best albums; Romo's lung; Vick's brain; the Giants' lying hearts; and so on.  Plus, Shek & Rank jump in the DeLorean to see who wins Week 3's biggest game.   Side B

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
